name: Family Time
text: Give to the Sue Storm player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Sue Storm → remove Family Time from the game. • Discard a card from your hand → discard this obligation.

flavor: "Did you think I wear this armor merely for show?"
name: Psycho-Man
text: Forced Response: After Psycho-Man activates, discard 4 cards from the encounter deck. If any Invisible Woman Nemesis cards were discarded this way, reveal them instead.

name: Emotional Masterplan
text: Heroes cannot change form. Action: Discard 2 cards from your hand → treat the printed text box of this card as if it were blank until the end of your turn.

name: Microversal Maneuvers
text: Attach to Psycho-Man. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Response: After Psycho-Man schemes against you, take 1 indirect damage. [star] Boost: Reveal this card.

flavor: "Is your spirit broken yet? It soon will be." —Psycho-Man
name: Titanic Terror
text: Attach to Psycho-Man. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Response: After Psycho-Man attacks, place 1 threat on the main scheme. [star] Boost: Reveal this card.

flavor: "I will tear through your minds until you BEG me to stop. Then everyone can fear the Psycho-Man." —Psycho-Man
name: End Of The Line
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 8 cards from the encounter deck. If Microversal Maneuvers or Titanic Terror are discarded this way, reveal them.

name: Ben's Cure
text: Give to the Reed Richards player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Reed Richards and discard a card with a printed [mental] resource → remove Ben's Cure from the game. • Take 1 damage and place 1 threat on the main scheme → discard this obligation.

flavor: "I possess the greatest weapon of all -- the world's greatest brain!!"
name: Wizard

flavor: Wizard has a nefarious plot in mind.
name: Hubris
text: When Revealed: Place X additional threat here, where X is the combined THW of all heroes.

flavor: "As is your nature, clod... you look, but you do not see... the FULL picture." —Wizard
name: Projection
text: Incite 1. Surge. Attach to your identity card. [star] Boost: Attach to your identity card.

name: Execution
text: When Revealed: Discard each Projection attachment in play. For each attachment discarded this way, each player must choose to either discard 2 cards from their hand or take 2 indirect damage. If no Projection attachments were discarded this way, shuffle Execution back into the encounter deck and this card gains surge.
